item.title: Add Nordigen to APIs, Data an ML
item.description: https://nordigen.com - Free open banking data API. PSD2. Connect 2300+ banks with your app/software in EU+UK.

item.title: update Idrive e2 pricing
item.description: https://www.idrive.com/e2/ - - S3 compatibility object storage. 10 GB free storage and 10 GB download bandwidth per month.

item.title: chore(readme): fix reset usage context
item.description: https://a11ywatch.com - Powerful web accessibility tool at scale. Free site-wide web acessibility testing and beyond that resets daily.

item.title: Adding flat.social to the list
item.description: https://flat.social - Interactive customizable spaces for team meetings & happy hours socials. Unlimited meetings, free up to 8 concurrent users.

item.title: Adding WayScript to PaaS devtools
item.description: https://www.wayscript.com/pricing - is an [internal developer platform (IDP)](https://blog.wayscript.com/what-is-an-internal-developer-platform-idp/) that allows software engineers to self-serve secure, cloud based (Docker + k8s) developer environments at any time. Remove the need to get resources provisioned on a one off basis. Quickly build tools, apps, APIs, dashboards, schedule cron tasks and more. 744 hours of [free runtime per month](https://www.wayscript.com/pricing).

item.title: some markdown issues
item.description:
https://www.semasoftware.com/ - Free developer portfolio tool able to consolidate and snapshot contributions across multiple repositories into a single report.
https://www.gatsbyjs.com/ - Gatsby is the fast and flexible framework that makes building websites with any CMS, API, or database fun again. Build and deploy headless websites that drive more traffic, convert better, and earn more revenue!
https://www.divio.com/ - A platform to manage cloud application deploying only using Docker. Available free subscription for development projects, Requires card and no custom domain support.
https://localxpose.io - Reverse proxy that enables you to expose your localhost servers to the internet. Free plan has 15 mintues tunnel life time.
https://rive.app/community/ - Community assets as well as create your own game assets using its free plan.
https://get.localhost.direct - A better `*.localhost.direct` Wildcard public CA signed SSL cert for localhost development with sub-domain support
https://markodenic.com/tools/buttons-generator/ - â€” 100+ buttons you can use in your project.
